com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.file

Interface File

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContentAccess, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileItemWrap

    public interface File
extends ContentAccess
    Provides access to the contents of a file.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Christina Harris

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getFileName()
      Returns the name of the file without the file extension.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      Returns an InputStream that can be used to retrieve the contents of the file.
      String getName()
      Returns the original filename in the client's filesystem, as provided by the browser (or other client software).
      long getSize()
      Returns the size of the file.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.ContentAccess

        getBytes, getDescription, getMimeType

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the original filename in the client's filesystem, as provided by the browser (or other client software).
        Returns:
        The original filename in the client's filesystem.

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        Returns an InputStream that can be used to retrieve the contents of the file.
        Returns:
        An InputStream that can be used to retrieve the contents of the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs.

      • getSize

        long getSize()
        Returns the size of the file.
        Returns:
        The size of the file, in bytes.

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Returns the name of the file without the file extension.
        Returns:
        the name of the file
